1.content: Alex has spent the last couple of months wearing diapers, because no one could figure out how to get her back to normal. But her dad had had enough of the constant diaper changing, so he decided that in the morning he would try to potty train Alex again. This he thought was going to be hard since Alex didn't become fully potty trained until she was five years old. He told Alex that in the morning they would try to get her potty trained. So how will the next morning go, You decide.
1.title: Alex's 1st Day of Repotty Training

choices: Alex makes it to the potty
Alex doesn't make it to the potty
Mason comes over to help watch Alex
Harper comes downstairs and asks if she could bring Alex to the zoo
11.content: Alex wakes up the next morning and is immediately shocked by the fact that she was laying down in a wet and poopy diaper. She begins to cry like a little baby, and Justin runs in and asks her what's wrong. Alex immediately points to her diaper, and Justin tries to leave but Alex starts crying again. Justin finally gives in to changing her diaper, first he untapes the diaper, then he lifts her legs and wipes her butt, then he puts a pullup on her. Justin still couldn't belive that he had to change his 17 year old sisters diapers, but hopefully by the end of the day he wouldn't have to anymore. Alex got out of bed and walked out to the living room and watched some tv, not even flinching as she filled her pullup with pee, then poop. Her dad came down a couple minutes later, and was about to start cooking breakfast when he smelt Alex's accident. He quickly grabbed Alex and lifted her onto a changing table, and began changing Alex into a fresh pullup. He then told her that if she feels the need to go to the bathroom, that she should try and make it to the potty. What happens next you decide.
11.title: Alex wakes up in a very messy diaper

112.content:
Alex went back to watching tv while her daddy was cooking breakfast, but Alex still couldn't tell when she needed to go to the bathroom. She just sat there as she filled her pullup up with pee, but this time Alex was in for a surprise because her daddy put her into a cool alert pullup. As soon as her pullup got wet, Alex shrieked because she felt something cold. Alex started to cry because she didn't know what was going on, her daddy guessed what happened and brought Alex into the bathroom. He then pulled down her pants to reveal the soaking wet pullup, then he explained to her that when she feels that cold feeling that means she has to run to the potty. He then changed her into a new pullup, and sent her on her way then went back to cooking. He finished cooking breakfast then he called everyone down so that they could eat. They made it through breakfast without any incedents, Alex only slightly wet her pullup.

How will things go for Alex now? You decide.
112.title: Alex doesn't make it to the potty

choices: Alex has an accident in the middle of a toy store, and her pullup leaks
Alex tells Harper that she has to go potty, and they make it just in time.
1121.content: After breakfast Alex went upstairs to her room to lie down for a little bit. An hour passed by, and Harper came upstairs to check on Alex. Harper went over to Alex's bed and woke her up, then she checked Alex's pullup. Harper was then hit by the smell of the poop in Alex's pullup, she quickly brought Alex over to the changing table and began undoing the sides of the pullup. She then lifted Alex's legs and wiped all the poop off of her but, then she wiped Alex's crotch from all of the pee, then put baby powder on her and put her into a new pullup. After that she got Alex dressed into a pair of jeans, and a nice shirt and told Alex that they were gonna go to the mall to do a little shopping. They went out to the car, and Harper buckled Alex's seatbelt and they left. A couple of minutes later they arrived at the mall, and Harper grabbed Alex's purse and stocked it with some pullups, baby powder, rash cream, and other necessities then they went inside. What will happen while Alex and Harper are shopping? You decide, all you have to do is write.
1121.title: Alex watches some more tv, and has another acci...

11211.content:
Once they got inside Alex immediately started begging Harper to go to the toy store, Harper wasn't sure about it at first but she finally gave in. After Alex got the okay from Harper she ran off to look at some of the newest barbies and other stuff that she wanted. Harper knew that something bad might happen so she tried to stay as close to Alex as possible. Alex was trying on some different play clothes when the worst thing happened, Alex had wet her pullup so much that it had started to leak. Before Harper could get over to Alex a couple of girls noticed that Alex's pullup was leaking, and started making fun of her. One girl said, "hey look everybody this girls wetting herself, and she's like 17 years old," then everyone started laughing. Alex just started crying and ran out of the store, with Harper trailing behind trying to keep up, Harper finally caught up with her when Alex decided to sit down by a fountain. Harper sat down next to Alex and tried to comfort her saying, "accidents happen its okay, cheer up," then she brought Alex into the girls room and changed her into a new pullup. Once she was finished changing Alex, Harper told her that it was time to take a break for lunch. They went to the foodcourt, got their lunches and sat down.


What will happen during lunch, you decide, please add some chapters.
11211.title: Alex has an accident in the middle of a toy sto...

choices: Harper tries to calm down Alex
112111.content: The two girls walked to their table Alex holding a happy meal and Harper a chicken salad. They ate in silence (amazing for a three year old. even if just mentally). They soon finished and started to wander the mall. Alex made Harper stop in every shop and looked at everything with intense fascination. Before long they had been through half the mall and Alex was standing in a yet again wet pullup. She shrugged it off as Harper led her to Alex's home say, "You need to calm down some next time I bring you here. Okay?" She didn't expect an answer so she just kept walking. They were half way home when Alex had a VERY messy accident. They were in the middle of a crowded street when Alex had the accident. The pullup strained against the mess and burst in the back releasing it all and showing clearly through her jeans. Everyone immediately noticed. Some stared shocked, some laughed, some even took photos and videos. Alex just cried in embarrassment while Harper tried to console her.

"And," he says,"and you only get 6 diapers a day." Justin quiped at his sister. "Still want to be a baby now?"
         Alex pondered in her head, then asked "How often exactly will I be using my diaper? and in what way?"
         "Well, you'll have to figure that out. Something you'll have to risk. You'll be wearing larger diapers than you're used to, or at least ones that can expand more."
         "Ugh" she groaned, then thought about the situation. "I really like being a baby, but is it worth using my diaper more than a regular baby? I mean regular babies go an awful lot already..." she thought to herself. "Do I even like using my diaper?" she thought and tried to remember what it was like filling her diaper. As far as she could tell, she enjoyed it, or at least she thought so. That might have been because she made Justin change her or something, he hated that. "Can I change my mind after I choose?"
         "I don't see why not."
         "Ok, so there's that too." she thought to herself. "Alright, I get treated like a baby and I have to use my diaper more often than a real baby. Those are the rules?"

1531311222.content:
During dinner Alex pooped her pants, and Harper went and got a diaper and was trying to change Alex into it, when Alex started arguing with her saying "Why are you trying to diaper me, I'm trying to get potty trained." "Because you are having way too many accidents," Harper said. "I promise I'll try to make it to the potty more often," Alex says.

Does Harper allow Alex to be put back in training pants, or does she go ahead and diaper her?

15313112221.content:
"Ok Alex I'll put you back into training pants, but under one condition," Harper said.

"What's the condition," Alex asked?

"You are now under the 3 strike rule, meaning if you have 3 accidents in a week you are back in diapers," Harper told Alex.

"Ok I'll accept that condition," Alex said.

"Now which type of training pants do you prefer Alex, Cloth or Pullups," Harper asked her.

What kind of training pants does Alex prefer, Cloth or Pullups?

153131122212.content:
"I prefer to wear pullups," Alex said.

So Harper went and got a pullup, and told Alex to lie down on the ground. Then she removed Alex's messy cloth training panties, and wiped her down, then she powdered her, and slid the pullup up in between her legs. Then she put a skirt on Alex.

"Ok now remember if you have more than 3 accidents in a week you'll be put back in diapers.

Alex didn't have anymore problems until _____.

info.brief_description: Alex Russo is back in diapers, and is trying to get re-potty trained. Please add chapters.
info.description:
Alex Russo is mentally regressed to the age of three by a spell gone wrong by Justin in the story "Baby on Waverly Place," by Dude 101, and she gets put back into diapers because she starts having accidents again. This story should follow what would happen after that. Now Alex has to be repotty trained, because Justin and Jerry Russo can't figure out how to undo the spell that Justin did. If you thought potty training a little kid is tough, just wait until you try to potty train a 17 year old girl with the mind of a three year old. Please no swearing, keep the story like the show would be. Please add some more chapters, I want to keep this story going.

**Note I don't own the copyrights to Wizards of Waverly Place, or its characters this is just a story.**

**This story has 8000+ Views, thanks everyone for reading and adding to this story.**
info.pretty_title: Alex Russo Gets Potty Trained Again
